reviews.text: This place is a gem! I ordered online and it was ready when they said it would be. Friendly service and nice space with outdoor seating, too.
I live around the corner and absolutely LOVE this place, best restaurant in this neighborhood (even better than Di***)

This place gives you good food at reasonable cost. El Mexicano Restaurante & Cafe Inc. 4 keeps their quality consistent. The menu features uncommon items prepared skillfully. Staff recalling past visits creates trust. This place is so good.

I keep finding new favorites with each visit here. Their menu items taste wonderful. Those who notice restaurant design will appreciate the effort here. Their staff showed service that exceeded everything I've known. This place gets my vote of confidence.

One of the best flautas that I‚Äôve tried! Definitely appreciate the details of the restaurant and its decoration, even the plates are beautifully plated and the food tasted fresh. Especially the guacamole and chips they definitely did it at the moment! The horchata was also really good. I don‚Äôt have anything negative about this place, and I do plan on visiting again when in the area!
13 bucks and change for a huge quesadilla. Delicious. Definitely come by if you in the area.
Delicious food I will definitely be back. The staff was so wonderful. The food was so fresh and flavorful. The lengua was some of the best I've had.

The best Torta de Bistec I ever had super delicious flavor and well season on the meat, very tender and soft. Handmade tortillas well filling food is super great here. Love the food here, def coming back for more to try out more of the menu.

What a wonderful find! The staff is super nice. The food was really good. Very affordable price especially for New York. Coming from Houston, I really miss authentic Mexican restaurants. Although the dining room is small, I highly recommend dining here. I will be back soon!
Fast and free delivery. Food was excellent. Highly recommend!
the quesedilla was amazing and burritos are bomb too

I love it here, I always tip well

Ordered grilled salmon for delivery. The fish looked a little overcooked but tasted quite good. The black beans were *very* good. Will definitely order from here again.
Thank you for accommodating my special request!

Very very good food, great value, amazing atmosphere inside.

Love the variety of Mexican and American dishes.

I got a beef burrito, there was a great amount of actually seared STEAK. You never see it anymore!

Legit burrito and nice art.

Best Mexican food in the local area. Have eaten here numerous times and never had a bad meal. Food is flavorful, cooked fresh, and portions are big. Customer service is friendly and respectful. Highly recommend the Torta de Bistec de Milanesa.

This Mexican place is awesome! Great people, really good food and amazing prices. Since I‚Äôve found this place last month I‚Äôve been here 4 times. The HUGE $9:50 chicken burrito rancheros are delicious. They make super crunchy homemade chips with the tastiest guacamole dip. The place is small, but tastefully decorated. You will not be disappointed here.

What happened within those four walls was between me and god. I ate like a starved animal. Walked in expecting I'd get a raggedy burrito and was handed a monster.

Devoured within five minutes. Best Mexican I've had in NYC in my year of living here.
Everything about this place is amazing‚Ä¶ food is delicious. Hope they have a lot of great success in the future to come cause I will be ordering here.

Came here to eat with my family and everything was great. Only a few tables but the decorations and service were both great. Everything everyone had was absolutely delicious. Large portions with great prices. We have also had the food delivered and it travels well.

An amazing place to eat. Definitely come try these authentic Mexican dishes with your friends. Their horchata will leave you wanting to order more and the restaurant is so nicely decorated. It feels warm and homey. Highly recommend!

Loved the food I had here ‚Äî we ordered enchilladas with green sauce and carnitas, tostadas with chicken, a gordita with beef, a few other things. Fresh ingredients, rich flavors. The order was ready quickly + the staff was nice. They have a small dine-in area with *very* colorful decorations ‚Äî cool to look at. I‚Äôve only tried a few Mexican places in the Flatbush area but this is definitely the best I‚Äôve had.
Delicious food excellent service would definitely come back!
My family had lunch today and it was a great experience. Food is delicious, and excellent service. Beautiful interior, furniture design brings Mexican art & culture. Go and check it out!
Best lengua tacos and lengua quesadilla. Guacamole is good also and it goes with homemade fresh chips. Nice authentic atmosphere. We just loved it! Gonna back soon again
Finally a decent place to order out and eat in! I love the chicken salad and tacos. This place saved me from my boring food options at work.

Finally a place to get some authentic Mexican food in the middle of Midwood, and it‚Äôs actually super tasty.

You can get usual Mexican stuff like tacos, and burritos, but also things like enchiladas, tamales, tortas, cemitas, steak(bistec) with rice and beans, or if you‚Äôre mood for some good old burgers or fried chicken, they have that covered as well.
Fast service, great food. Everything I've gotten has been fresh and tasty. Also very affordable.
Great Mexican food in Midwood!
The cheese enchiladas rojas were delicious. Amazing salsa and good cheese inside! The staff are also really nice!
It was most delicious Mexican food i have ever tasted! Prices are low and defined would recommend
Best lengua taco! Highly recommend and am so happy to have a great Mexican place near me now. Customer service is very friendly as well
The food was delicious. The staff were very friendly. I will definitely go back. Thank you so much, Elvis!
Very flavorful and authentic Mexican food, friendly service and large portions as well and a very clean space!
I‚Äôm so happy this place is in Midwood! From the quesadilla, to the burrito, to the American food‚Ä¶ it hits the spot each and every time! I love it
Everything was delicious.
